channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 在中国一年一度的全国人民代表大会的第一天，李强总理宣布了5%的经济增长目标和国防开支的增长。以下是主要内容
item.description:
A 5% growth target and a boost in defense spending are some of the things announced by Premier Li Qiang on the first day of China's annual National People's Congress.

But he said there would be challenges ahead. Here are the key takeaways https://t.co/Pmfvly0o44 pic.twitter.com/UXSH2y94La

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 据总部位于孟买的投资银行公司 Spark 称，塔塔集团可能在未来 18 个月内进行的首次公开募股中获得高达 960 亿美元的估值。
item.description:
Tata Sons may fetch a valuation of as much as $96 billion in IPO that could potentially take place within the next 18 months, according to Mumbai-based investment banking firm Spark https://t.co/Uhy0M1rA1x

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 胡塞武装分子在红海的袭击带来了新的威胁--泄漏可能导致环境灾难
item.description:
Attacks by Houthi militants in the Red Sea are bringing a new threat — spills that can result in environmental disaster https://t.co/RNBPSXphTp

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 凤凰卫视同意以约 9.71 亿欧元的价格收购 Cellnex 的爱尔兰业务，因为这家西班牙铁塔运营商正在寻求精简业务和偿还债务的方法
item.description:
Phoenix Tower agrees to buy Cellnex's Irish business for about €971 million, as the Spanish tower operator looks for ways to streamline its operations and pay down debt https://t.co/vbZpy0StxV

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 中国万科（China Vanke）表示已准备好资金偿还下周到期的美元债券，以安抚投资者对该开发商可能需要更多喘息空间来履行其债务义务的担忧。
item.description:
China Vanke says it has prepared funds to repay a dollar bond due next week, seeking to soothe investors concerned that the developer may need more breathing room to meet its debt obligations https://t.co/lUZ3lPrHS8

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 2022年，一艘载有数千辆汽车的货轮沉没，大众汽车因保时捷电动车电池引发火灾而面临诉讼
item.description:
Volkswagen faces lawsuits over claims it was the battery in a Porsche EV that triggered the 2022 fire onboard a cargo ship that sank with thousands of cars on board https://t.co/36T7BCOINB

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 在俄罗斯，人民币融资变得昂贵而稀缺，扼杀了当地企业获得外国资本的途径
item.description:
Yuan financing is becoming costly and sparse in Russia, choking off a pathway to foreign capital for companies there https://t.co/u1r0IfFw5A

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 财政大臣杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）将谨防在本周的预算案中激起债券守夜人的愤怒，@marcusashworth 写道（通过 @opinion
item.description:
Chancellor of the Exchequer Jeremy Hunt will be wary of rousing the ire of the bond vigilantes at this week's budget, @marcusashworth writes (via @opinion) https://t.co/CYUMTqHVXw

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 仅在 10 个月前，英国在投资者眼中还是一潭死水。现在，越来越多的人乐观地认为英国即将反弹。
item.description:
The UK looked like a basket case to investors just 10 months ago

Now, optimism is growing that the country is about to bounce back https://t.co/6OZ4vKOa4p

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 仅在 10 个月前，英国在投资者眼中还是一潭死水。现在，人们越来越乐观，认为英国即将反弹
item.description:
The UK looked like a basket case to investors just 10 months ago.

Now, optimism is growing that the country is about to bounce back https://t.co/pfRNKhAQPJ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 住友制药称，由于债务市场对其信用质量的担忧加剧，该公司计划本月在其美国子公司裁员约 400 人，推进重组。
item.description:
Sumitomo Pharma says it plans to cut about 400 jobs at its US subsidiary this month, pushing ahead with restructuring as debt market concern about its credit quality mounts https://t.co/RFXzEIsPet

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 新消息：去年四月，英国作为全球投资目的地的声誉跌至谷底，但不到一年的时间，人们的信心正在恢复，对英国作为经商之地的新乐观主义情绪⬇️。
item.description:
NEW: The UK's reputation as a global investment destination hit rock bottom last April

But less than a year on, confidence is recovering and there's a new sense of optimism in the UK as a place to do business ⬇️ https://t.co/Vdy3CzEaxh

— Bloomberg UK (@BloombergUK) March 5, 2024

item.title: 以下是全国人民代表大会第一天的主要收获，包括李强总理的首份工作报告，其中确定了中国 2024 年的政策立场
item.description:
Here are the key takeaways from Day One of the National People’s Congress, including Premier Li Qiang’s first work report to set China’s policy stance for 2024 https://t.co/GPsmLEOoAE

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 中国为刺激疲软的消费情绪所做的最新努力？中国政府敦促民众更换新款家电和汽车，并承诺为他们提供更多的带薪假期，让他们可以购物和消费。
item.description:
China’s latest bid to fuel weak consumer sentiment? Urging citizens to trade in their appliances and cars for new models, and promising they’ll get more paid vacation days where they can shop and spend. https://t.co/49okAEjNtv

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 韩国制定了一项应急计划，以应对实习医生因抗议医学院增加招生计划而举行的长期罢工，罢工已威胁到医疗服务的提供。
item.description:
South Korea has a contingency plan for a prolonged walkout by trainee doctors that has threatened the delivery of health care as they protest against a plan to increase medical school enrollment https://t.co/kKQq0XQofv

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 印度储备银行已要求该国主要的国有炼油企业向波斯湾供应商施压，要求他们在下一财政年度至少接受 10% 的石油付款以卢比支付，三家加工商的高管如是说
item.description:
The Reserve Bank of India has asked the country’s major state-owned refiners to press Persian Gulf suppliers to accept at least 10% of oil payments in rupees in the next financial year, three executives at the processors say https://t.co/ndKDsK656J

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 马尔代夫国防部称，中国同意向马尔代夫提供无偿军事援助，这表明在印度军队被迫撤离马尔代夫仅数月后，中国与北京的防务关系更加紧密了
item.description:
China agreed to provide free military assistance to the Maldives, the island’s defense ministry says, signaling closer defense ties with Beijing just months after Indian troops were forced to leave the country https://t.co/rF34zPIZG3

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）表示，尼日利亚政府必须紧急应对日益严重的粮食不安全问题，该国几乎每 10 人中就有 1 人面临饥饿。
item.description:
Nigeria’s government must urgently address growing food insecurity, with almost one in 10 people facing hunger, the IMF says https://t.co/ifaxgpT1Tb

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 根据 Counterpoint Research 公司的数据，今年前六周，iPhone 在中国的销量下降了 24%。这是苹果公司在美国以外最大市场遇到麻烦的又一迹象。通过 @vladsavov
item.description:
iPhone sales tumbled 24% in China over the first six weeks of the year, according to Counterpoint Research data. It's another sign of trouble for Apple in its biggest market outside the US. Via @vladsavov https://t.co/34bpY80zg3

— Peter Elstrom (@pelstrom) March 5, 2024

item.title: 以下是伦敦金融城及其他地区的最新新闻和见解
item.description:
Here's the latest news and insights from the City of London and beyond https://t.co/N4CUf0yPJc

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 新加坡呼吁国民 "爱上电动汽车"，并提供一系列激励措施和回扣，使电动汽车更加经济实惠
item.description:
Singapore is urging citizens to “fall in love with EVs” and is offering a series of incentives and rebates to make electric vehicles more affordable https://t.co/wwNqYZUCfR

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的数据显示，全球长期投资者对中国股市的避险情绪有所减弱，部分基金不再看空中国股市。
item.description:
A shift away from Chinese equities by global long-term investors has taken a pause, with some funds getting less bearish, according to Morgan Stanley https://t.co/FUMmKEoEkX

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称，杰富瑞正在从摩根大通招聘两名银行家，作为其建立中东和北非特许经营权的最新举措之一
item.description:
Jefferies is hiring two bankers from JPMorgan Chase as part of its latest push to build out its Middle East and North Africa franchise, sources say https://t.co/m2Y0tswcvq

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 据说 AMD 向中国销售芯片的计划遇到了障碍
item.description:
AMD is said to have hit a roadblock in its plans to sell chips to China https://t.co/N2VOD9oflU

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 在欧洲开始新的一天需要知道的五件事
item.description:
Five things you need to know to start your day in Europe https://t.co/6pwt8OvvcP

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 欧盟将于今天公布其促进国防工业发展的全面计划，但除非欧盟能找到资金，否则该计划有可能落空。阅读布鲁塞尔版
item.description:
The EU will unveil its sweeping plan today to boost its defense industry, but unless it can find the funds, the initiative risks falling flat. Read the Brussels Edition https://t.co/5HilZSwuwm

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: AMD 试图销售专为中国市场定制的人工智能芯片，却遭遇了美国政府的阻挠
item.description:
AMD hit a US government roadblock in its attempt to sell an AI chip tailored for the Chinese market https://t.co/Y69ABpVGgl

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: @johnauthers 说，问题不在于泡沫和估值，而在于这个市场是否会继续上涨。这取决于对个人行为和群体动力的判断
item.description:
The question isn't about bubbles and valuations, says @johnauthers, it's whether this market will keep going up. That comes down to a judgment call on individual behavior and group dynamics https://t.co/EEh1y0t8a8

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 比特币的价格已接近历史最高点，加密货币的忠实拥趸们正翘首以盼一个前所未有的水平--但就市值而言，比特币已经创下了历史新高。
item.description:
Bitcoin's price is in touching distance of an all-time high and the crypto faithful are on tenterhooks for a never-before-seen level — but in market value terms the token is already touched a record https://t.co/nc7yCwrqtX

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称，印度电动摩托车制造商 Ather Energy 已选择汇丰银行、野村控股和摩根大通帮助安排其在孟买的首次公开募股。
item.description:
Indian electric-scooter maker Ather Energy has picked HSBC, Nomura Holdings and JPMorgan to help arrange its IPO in Mumbai, sources say. https://t.co/Dxr1ntJbJJ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024
